Week 3
Week 3 (Feb 24- March 1st)
I spent about

Net time editing 3 hours 10 pages
Research/learning 6 hours 1 weeks period

I spent about one hour on user journeys for Eris Academy on my [http://ksenya.viral.academy/view/welcome-visitors/view/recent-changes/view/user-journey Viral Academy Wiki]. Main idea was to test SFW as a tool of organising user journeys - similar to post its. I think It works rely well.
I spent about an hour prototyping a SFW based learning management system, See

I spent about half an hour on looking at how a SFW based learning management system would look like. This is a draft on course description linkedfrom the Welcome page [[Course Content]] This is a draft, and I would like some help on brushing up the text.
I spent about an hut on getting rid of stubs in the part of a wiki dedicated to [[Eris]]
I have spent

Net time editing 3 hours 10 pages
Research/learning 10 hours 1 weeks period

I have spent about 10 hours on reading, researching, watching tutorials and interviews. I searched for innformation on Project Doug, which Eris originates from, read tutorials on consumer journey mapping, as well looking for cool information related to hypertext.
To summarise, I notices that a lot of the SFW making process is actually taken by research, reading watching vids, and most importantly thinking of how to organise content.

story.text:
Net time editing 4 hours 15 pages
Research/learning 10 hours 1 weeks period

I spent about one hour on user journeys for Eris Academy on my [http://ksenya.viral.academy/view/welcome-visitors/view/recent-changes/view/user-journey Viral Academy Wiki]. Main idea was to test SFW as a tool of organising user journeys - similar to post its. I think It works rely well.

I spent about half an hour on looking at how a SFW based learning management system would look like. This is a draft on course description linkedfrom the Welcome page [[Course Content]] This is a draft, and I would like some help on brushing up the text.
I spent about an hut on getting rid of stubs in the part of a wiki dedicated to [[Eris]].
I spent about an hour getting rid of stubs and adding general information to [[Block Chain Projects]] page for wider coverage of this type of technology.

I have spent about 10 hours on reading, researching, watching tutorials and interviews. I searched for innformation on Project Doug, which Eris originates from, read tutorials on consumer journey mapping, as well looking for cool information related to hypertext added a small page on [[Ted Nelson]].
To summarise, I notices that a lot of the SFW making process is actually taken by research, reading watching vids, and most importantly thinking of how to organise content.
